mapper.select: select * from material where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select material_type from material where is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into material (material_code, material_name, material_type, material_num, material_price) values (#{materialCode}, #{materialName}, #{materialType}, #{materialNum}, #{materialPrice})
mapper.update: update material set material_code = #{materialCode}, material_name = #{materialName}, material_type = #{materialType}, material_num = #{materialNum}, material_price = #{materialPrice} where material_code = #{materialCode}
